content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Mr. Haoyu Wang from China. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Duisburg, let us focus solely on discussing the rental price during our negotiation. To initiate, I propose a starting point of 1250 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your straightforwardness, Mr. Schmidt. I am a student, so I have to be mindful of my expenses. I propose a lower price of 1100 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because student concessions are not my priority in this situation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. Let's continue the negotiation. I propose 1150 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Though reluctant, I agree to the price of 1150 Euros per month as it slightly favors my interests.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your understanding, Mr. Schmidt. I agree to the price of 1150 Euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China
